constraints.name: single_selection
constraints.description: 只能选择一个元素（餐厅）进行处理

constraints.name: capacity_constraint
constraints.description: 选取元素的时间成本不能超过给定的容量上限 S

constraints.name: value_difference
constraints.description: 如果选取元素的时间成本超过容量上限，则其价值减少为 f_i - (t_i - S)
constraints.formal: value = f_i - (t_i - S) if t_i > S, otherwise value = f_i
